channel.description: Recent content in Pages on GlacierZero

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi there! I’m Plácido Fernández. I live in canton Vaud, Switzerland.

I am tech lead working in Finance. I did my PhD in Computer Science and Technology at CERN, Switzerland, at the LHCb experiment, with University Carlos III of Madrid. Prior to my experience in Computing for High Energy Physics I worked in the space industry, at GMV, developing software for satellite control centers. Before that I did an intership at Thales in the rail signaling area.
